metadata.title: Improper shell escaping in ansible-runner (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in ansible-runner. An improper escaping of the shell command, while calling the ansible_runner.interface.run_command, can lead to parameters getting executed as host's shell command. A developer could unintentionally write code that gets executed in the host rather than the virtual environment. 
            STATEMENT: Satellite 6.12 and later versions are not affected by this flaw.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
python3-ansible-runner is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
